name: EXPLOSIVE DICE-A-RRHEA
description:
Note, only keyboard and mouse are supported.

Note 2, if you want the screen shake, make sure it to re-enable it everytime you come across the menu (it doesn't work when you just leave it for some reason).

===============================================================

EXPLOSIVE DICE-A-RRHEA is a game made in 48 hours for the GameMaker's Toolkit Game Jam 2022! The theme for it was "Roll of the Dice". 

Shoot with your Dice Shooter at enemies and get to the end!  There are 10 levels in total.

===============================================================

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Mouse - Aim 

Left Click - Shoot 

Space - Jump 

Backspace - Selfkill (for when you're stuck or don't have ammo)

===============================================================

Some info

The dice's rolled number is represented on top in the middle as a big number.

The damage taken on the enemies will be dependent on what number you "rolled" (for example if you rolled a 6, that would cause the highest damage).
